net.kuujo.vertigo.service

Interface Service

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The service type.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Component, ComponentCoordinator

    public interface Service
    Base interface for types that can be started and stopped.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Starts the service.

      Starts the service.
      void stop()
      Stops the service.

      Stops the service.
